page.title: 10The Priest-in-charge
page.content: Stanley Rowe was ordained by the Bishop of Chelmsford in 1950. He worked as a curate,vicar and teacher both in Nigeria and in England before retiring and then becoming priest-in-charge at Aston Rowant in 1983. He enjoys working in the Church because he likes helping people. Rev. Rowe looks after Crowell Parish Church as well. He conducts services every Sunday in Aston Rowant and three Sundays a month in Crowell. Of his work Rev. Rowe says that running a church is like running a business; he visits the sick,discusses christenings, weddings and funeral arrangements with his parishioners,participates in the organisation of the Youth Club and attends many different kinds of meetings on Church business, for the school and for the community.
